body.quiz:
Select the type of artwork that is created with more than one medium.

Image of: art supplies in containers
body.correct: Way to go! You know that mixed media is artwork created with a combination of different mediums.
body.failed: So close! Remember, mixed media is artwork created with more than one medium or material.

body.quiz:
What type of art takes steps of piecing together bits to make 3-D artwork?

Image of: a car that has been painted using a black and white floral pattern
body.correct: Great work! You know that assemblage is the art of assembling bit and pieces together.
body.failed: You're almost there. Assemblage is the type of art where bits and pieces are placed together to make 3-D art.

body.quiz:
If you think you’ve made a mistake while creating your artwork, what can you layer over the top of it that will add texture to your artwork?

Image of: female artist working in an art studio
body.correct: Way to go! You can use paint to cover up any mistake, and it will add texture.
body.failed: You're almost there. Remember, you can use paint to cover up a mistake, and it will even add interest and texture to your artwork.
